//!
//! This library is automatically generated from the Common Certificate Authority Database
//! (CCADB). See https://www.ccadb.org/ for more information.
//!
//! DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE.
//!
//! You can regenerate it using ccadb-utils. See the project README for more information.
//!

#![forbid(unsafe_code, unstable_features)]
#![deny(
    trivial_casts,
    trivial_numeric_casts,
    unused_import_braces,
    unused_extern_crates,
    unused_qualifications
)]

/// TLS_SERVER_ROOTS is a collection of root certificates that are:
///   0. Disclosed to CCADB and included in the "IncludedCACertificateReportPEMCSV.csv" report.
///   1. Included at the time of generation in the Mozilla root program.
///   2. Trusted for TLS certificate issuance. (e.g. not S/MIME, other).
///   3. Not distrusted as of the current generation time (e.g. if there is a
///      "Distrust for TLS After Date", it is in the future).
pub static TLS_SERVER_ROOTS: webpki::TlsServerTrustAnchors = webpki::TlsServerTrustAnchors(&[

{% for root in trusted_roots %}
  /*
   * Issuer: {{ root.issuer }}
   * Subject: {{ root.subject }}
   * Label: "{{ root.label }}"
   * Serial: {{ root.serial }}
   * SHA256 Fingerprint: {{ root.sha256_fp }}
{{+ root.pem|prefix("   * ") }}
   */
   webpki::TrustAnchor {
     subject: &{{ root.subject_der }},
     spki: &{{ root.spki }},
     name_constraints: {%- match root.name_constraints %}
       {%- when None %} None {%- when Some(der) %} Some(&{{ der }})
     {%- endmatch %}
   },
{% endfor %}

]);
